results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d<n} A019565(A193231(d)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_
A193231(n) = { my(x='x); subst(lift(Mod(1, 2)*subst(Pol(binary(n), x), x, 1+x)), x, 2) }; \\ From _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_ ?
xref: Cf. A019565, A193231, A290090, A293214, A293232 (rgs-version of this sequence).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 03 2017
